info.name: TC_1015986_Staffcalender
info.description: Validate a Staff member or Admin can schedule appointment for other staff member or student

body.raw:
{
    "firstname": "{{firstname}}{{$randomInt}}",
    "lastname": "{{lastname}}Staff",
    "middlename": "mid{{$randomInt}}",
    "mshied_maidenname": "maid{{$randomInt}}",
    "mshied_legacy": "true",
    "emailaddress1": "{{$randomInt}}{{emailaddress1}}",
    "gendercode": "{{gendercode}}",
    "numberofchildren": "{{numberofchildren}}",
    "nickname": "Nickname{{$randomInt}}",
    "familystatuscode": 2,
    "cmc_recentsat": "{{cmc_recentsat}}",
    "cmc_recentact": "{{cmc_recentact}}",
    "mshied_contacttype": "{{mshied_contacttype}}",
    "mshied_race": {{mshied_race}},
    "mshied_ethnicgroup": {{mshied_ethnicgroup}},
    "mshied_miltarystatus": "{{mshied_miltarystatus}}",
    "mshied_hipaaindicator": false,
    "creditonhold": "true",
    "leadsourcecode": 1,
    "territorycode": 1,
    "spousesname": "wife{{$randomInt}}",
    "shippingmethodcode": "{{shippingmethodcode}}",
    "preferredcontactmethodcode": "{{preferredcontactmethodcode}}",
    "mshied_nationality": "{{mshied_nationality}}",
    "cmc_sourcecategoryid@odata.bind": "/contacts({{gsourcecategoryid}})",
    "cmc_sourcemethodid@odata.bind": "/contacts({{gsourcemethodid}})",
    "cmc_titleid@odata.bind": "/contacts({{gtitleid}})",
    "cmc_srcpogramlevelid@odata.bind": "/contacts({{gprogramlevelid}})",
    "cmc_srcprogramid@odata.bind": "/contacts({{gProgram1}})",
    "cmc_educationlevelid@odata.bind": "/contacts({{geducationlevelid}})",
    "mshied_CurrentProgramLevelId@odata.bind": "/contacts({{gprogramlevelid}})",
    "mshied_CurrentProgramId@odata.bind": "/contacts({{gProgram1}})",
    "mshied_StudentStatusId@odata.bind": "/contacts({{gstudentstatusid}})",
    "mshied_CurrentAcademicPeriodId@odata.bind": "/mshied_academicperiods({{gacademicperiodid}})",
    "donotemail": true,
    "followemail": true,
    "cmc_donotsmstext": true,
    "donotbulkemail": true,
    "donotpostalmail": true,
    "donotphone": true,
    "donotfax": true,
    "cmc_autoupdatepicture": true,
    "fax": "78865{{$randomInt}}30",
    "mobilephone": "78965{{$randomInt}}30",
    "telephone1": "8569{{$randomInt}}230",
    "cmc_phone2extension": "8083{{$randomInt}}569",
    "websiteurl": "www.dcrm{{$randomInt}}.com",
     "createdby@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{guserid4}})",
    "ownerid@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{guserid4}})"
}

{
    "cmc_enddate": "{{timestampEndDate}}",
    "cmc_endtime": "{{end}}",
    "cmc_friday": true,
    "cmc_monday": true,
    "cmc_officehourstype": {{officehourstype}},
    "cmc_saturday": true,
    "cmc_startdate": "{{timestamp}}",
    "cmc_starttime": "{{start}}",
    "cmc_sunday": true,
    "cmc_thursday": true,
    "cmc_tuesday": true,
    "cmc_wednesday": true,
    "cmc_userlocationid@odata.bind": "/cmc_userlocations({{guserlocation1}})",
    "createdby@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{guserid4}})",
    "ownerid@odata.bind": "/systemusers({{guserid4}})"
}

exec: pm.test("Staffcalender is Created for student", function () {
